title: Live updates on NFL cut-down day: Latest news as teams trim their rosters
content: We're following releases, trades, signings and other intriguing moves for all 32 NFL teams before the 4 p.m. ET roster cut-down deadline.

title: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift reveal engagement
content: He knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring. Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's love story has reached new heights.

title: Source: Browns to release veteran WR Johnson
content: The Cleveland Browns are set to release veteran receiver Diontae Johnson, a source tells ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Yanks-Giants to open '26 in earliest U.S. opener
content: The San Francisco Giants will host the New York Yankees on March 25 to kick off the 2026 MLB season -- the earliest Opening Day in the U.S.

title: Colorado names transfer Salter QB1 for opener
content: Kaidon Salter, who transferred from Liberty to Colorado in December, has been named the starting quarterback for the Buffaloes ahead of Friday's season opener against Georgia Tech.

title: Buckeyes' orders for Sayin: 'Just win' vs. Horns
content: Ohio State coach Ryan Day has one message for freshman quarterback Julian Sayin, who will be making his first career start vs. No. 1 Texas on Saturday: "Just win."

title: Source: Jets cut 2024 third-round pick Corley
content: The Jets are waiving wide receiver Malachi Corley, who was selected by the team with the first pick of the third round in the 2024 draft.

title: Sources: Ex-Chiefs star Hardman cut by Packers
content: Mecole Hardman and Isaiah Simmons were among the players released Tuesday by the Packers, sources told ESPN.

title: ⚾ Reranking MLB farm systems from 1 to 30
content: The busiest time of the year for adding prospects has passed. Here's how every organization stacks up now.

title: How Travis Kelce has prepared for what could be his final season
content: Kelce, who announced his engagement to Taylor Swift on Tuesday, is ready for one more shot at Super Bowl glory.

title: Runaway MVPs, ROY races? Expert predictions for every major 2025-26 NBA award
content: Can Jokic claim a fourth MVP? Which rookie will impress? Our NBA Summer Forecast panel reveals its award predictions for the 2025-26 season.

title: WNBA Power Rankings: The MVP race heats up as Aces hold steady at No. 2
content: A'ja Wilson has led Las Vegas on an 11-game winning streak to clinch the league's second playoff spot.

title: Bo Nix, Calvin Ridley among Eric Moody's top draft targets
content: Eric Moody lists the players he's most excited about drafting this season, including some late-round targets.

title: Trey Hendrickson is latest Bengals star to get paid; now they have to win
content: Ja'Marr Chase, Tee Higgins and Hendrickson all landed new deals this offseason, and with that come expectations.

title: Predicting Keegan Bradley's final six Ryder Cup picks: Locks, guys on the bubble and maybe himself
content: Bradley will fill out his roster on Wednesday and the biggest question on everyone's mind is whether he'll be playing at Bethpage Black in September.

title: Premier League's most intriguing summer moves, from Cherki to Guessand
content: Given how much Premier League clubs spend these days, there are some curious moves under the surface that have major bust/boom potential. Let's review five of the most intriguing.

title: After skipping Gold Cup, Musah has big plans for USMNT in a World Cup year
content: United States international Yunus Musah speaks to ESPN's James Olley about his future at AC Milan and his high hopes for next year's World Cup hosts.

title: Way-Too-Early Bracketology: Is this (finally) the year of the Big Ten?
content: For a change, the Big Ten has both quantity and quality to send to the Dance. Can its 25-year title drought finally end?

title: College football betting: Breaking down the Heisman and national champion odds, top bets
content: Pamela Maldonado tracks the odds to win the Heisman Trophy and the national championship and shares bets that offer the best value.

title: The best 100 players in the NFL this season: Our experts' ranking, starting with four QBs in the top five
content: We predicted the top players in 2025. How many Eagles are ranked? Is Patrick Mahomes still No. 1? Where does Myles Garrett land?

title: Who were NFL Rank's 10 worst snubs? Scouts and execs ID the misses
content: Only 100 players can make the player rankings. Here are 10 more who league insiders felt should have been there.

title: Way-too-early UFC at the White House fight card
content: Dana White says a UFC event at the White House is "going to happen" in 2026, so let's take a early look at building a fight card fit for the venue.

title: Boxing divisional rankings:  Did Baraou's win land him in the junior middleweight top 10?
content: Abass Baraou and Yoenis Tellez put on a show during a slow boxing weekend. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: V of K-pop group BTS snaps photo with Shohei Ohtani, delivers Dodgers first pitch
content: V of K-pop sensation BTS threw a strike for the ceremonial first pitch before the Dodgers' game on Monday.

title: From the court to the villa: How Pepe Garcia found his way to 'Love Island'
content: The former Cal State Fullerton guard and international pro found himself back in the spotlight through "Love Island".

title: Why Cadillac chose Bottas, Pérez (and not an American) for F1 seats
content: There won't be an American behind the wheel of Cadillac's F1 car, but in Sergio Pérez and Valtteri Bottas, there's plenty of race-winning experience.

title: Does Frances Tiafoe have momentum on his side at the US Open?
content: Tiafoe is playing at his favorite tournament -- in front of crowds that adore him. This might be the year he gets past the US Open semifinals.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal make move for Martinez
content: Girona right back Arnau Martínez is on the radar of Arsenal. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Fantasy baseball pickups: Power, speed and a must-add returning ace
content: Here are the players you should claim off the waiver wire, including some pitchers returning from injury.

title: NHL draft prospect watch list: Who joins Gavin McKenna?
content: With the Hlinka-Gretzky Cup complete, draft season is here. Here are the top skaters to watch for next June.

title: Meitei Leaders Across Party Lines, Civil Body Allege Factual Errors In PUCL Report On Manipur Violence
content: Leaders cutting across party lines and civil society groups of the Meitei community in Manipur have asked a Delhi-based non-profit to apologise and withdraw what they called a "biased" report on the ethnic violence in the border state.

title: What Is 'Snapback'? European Nations' Iran Sanctions Move Explained
content: Britain, France and Germany have threatened to trigger a "snapback mechanism" to reintroduce UN sanctions over Tehran's atomic programme that were lifted under a now moribund 2015 Iran nuclear deal.

title: Powerful Storms Kicks Up Wall Of Dust, Leaving Thousands Without Power
content: A powerful storm kicked up a towering wall of dust that rolled through metro Phoenix on Monday, darkening the sky, blinding drivers, knocking out power and grounding flights at one of the nation's busiest airports.

title: After Row Over Bangladeshi Remarks, Ex-Planning Commission Member's U-Turn
content: Days after she sparked a massive controversy by speaking in favour of Bangladeshis, which Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma said was proof of her supporting illegal infiltrators, ex-Planning Commission member Syeda Hameed has made a U-turn.

title: Protests Erupt In Sri Lankan Capital Over Ex-President Wickremesinghe's Arrest
content: More than 1000 supporters of Sri Lanka's former president Ranil Wickremesinghe protested his arrest in Colombo on Tuesday ahead of a crucial hearing to decide whether to grant bail to the senior opposition politician accused of misusing public funds.

title: Study On AI Chatbot Responses To Suicide-Related Queries Shows Inconsistency
content: A study of how 3 popular artificial intelligence chatbots respond to queries about suicide found that they generally avoid answering questions that pose the highest risk to the user, such as for specific how-to guidance.

title: Amid Tariff Row, India Set To Sign $1 Billion Fighter Jet Engine Deal With US Firm: Report
content: India is close to signing a $1 billion deal with US firm GE for supplying another 113 GE-404 engines for indigenous combat aircraft.

title: France Heads For More Instability As Another Prime Minister Could Be Toppled
content: France 's prime minister has announced a confidence vote next month that likely will lead to the collapse of his centrist government and prompt another period of political instability in the European Union's second-biggest economy.

title: Key Facts About Iran's Influential Revolutionary Guard
content: Iran's paramilitary Revolutionary Guard has grown into a powerful force with the country's theocracy, answering only to its supreme leader and overseeing its ballistic missile arsenal and missions overseas.

title: Global Markets Tumble As Trump Intensifies Clash With Federal Reserve
content: Shares sank Tuesday in Europe and Asia after President Donald Trump announced he was firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.

title: Trump To Seek Death Penalty For Murders In US Capital
content: The US government will start seeking the death penalty in Washington, DC, homicide cases, US President Donald Trump said on Tuesday.

title: "Deliberate" Demographic Changes Taking Place Along Borders: Amit Shah
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Tuesday said demographic changes are taking place in border areas as part of a "deliberate design" and they directly impact the security of the country and its borders.

title: 2 Students Burn Boy's Stomach, Hands With Iron Box In Andhra Pradesh: Cops
content: A student suffered severe burns after two of his classmates allegedly burnt him with an iron box in the hostel room of their private school at Morampudi in Konaseema district, said a police official on Tuesday.

title: Israel Says Targeted Hamas Camera In Strikes That Killed Gaza Journalists
content: The Israeli military on Tuesday said its forces were targeting a camera operated by Hamas in two strikes that killed five journalists at a hospital a day earlier, triggering a wave of international condemnation.

title: Lioness 'Indhu', Rescued From Circus 20 Years Ago, Dies At Tirupati Zoo
content: A 23-year-old lioness, Indhu, which was rescued from a circus more than 20 years ago succumbed to age-related ailments in Tirupati Zoo on Tuesday.

title: RSS Should Be Discussed On Facts, Not Perceptions: Mohan Bhagwat
content: Addressing a packed gathering at Vigyan Bhawan on Tuesday, Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) chief Mohan Bhagwat marked the centenary lecture series "100 Years of Sangh's Journey: New Horizons."

title: "Hindu Rashtra Does Not Mean Excluding Anyone": Mohan Bhagwat
content: In a unifying message to the nation, RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat said on Tuesday that India's diversity is a source of its unity, and having a different ideology is "not a crime".

title: Video: Bike Falls, Car Dangles As Part Of Bridge Gets Washed Away In Jammu
content: A portion of a bridge caved in Jammu, leaving several vehicles stranded. Visuals showed one car dangling, and a motorcycle falling as the road beneath it got washed away.

title: "Those Who Opposed Us Have Become Friends": RSS Chief On Centenary
content: Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh chief Mohan Bhagwat, in his speech opening the centenary celebrations of the organisation, sounded a note of unity today, reiterating that the Sangh, is "not a reactionary organisation".

title: Explained: How will Trump’s tariffs impact India’s exports to US? These sectors hardest hit
content: The US has imposed 50% tariffs on Indian exports, effective August 27, 2025, which may significantly impact MSMEs. Gems and jewellery, textiles, seafood, chemicals, and auto components sectors will be most affected.

title: ‘We’re going to change the green card’: Trump's H-1B shake-up — what it means for Indians
content: The Trump administration plans to revamp the US H-1B visa and green card systems. The current lottery system may be replaced with wage-based allocation. A 'Gold Card' initiative is also under consideration. This aims to attract high-skilled, high-earning individuals. Howard Lutnick calls the current H-1B system a scam. These changes align with Trump's 'America First' immigration policy.

title: FIDE World Cup 2025 in India: PM Modi tweets; 'Chess is gaining popularity among our youth'
content: Goa is set to host the FIDE World Cup from October 30 to November 27, offering three Candidates Tournament spots and a $2 million prize pool. The event features chess giants like D Gukesh, Magnus Carlsen, and R Praggnanandhaa. India boasts a strong contingent of 21 players, including Viswanathan Anand, as the World Cup returns to India after 23 years.

title: 200 Chinese planes unable to fly: Trump ‘reminds’ China
content: Donald Trump threatened China with 200% tariffs if rare-earth magnet exports are curbed, jeopardizing the trade truce. Trump claimed the U.S. leverage includes withholding Boeing parts, grounding Chinese planes. China's magnet exports to the U.S. surged recently. A Chinese analyst dismissed Trump's remarks as a bluff.

title: 'Built a floating F-35': Rajnath Singh's shoutout to navy's new stealth frigates - and a US mention
content: Defence minister Rajnath Singh commissioned INS Udaygiri and INS Himgiri, advanced stealth frigates, in Visakhapatnam, significantly boosting India's maritime capabilities. Singh highlighted the Navy's crucial role in safeguarding national economic security, especially in the Indian Ocean. He also referenced 'Operation Sindoor' as a firm response to terrorism.

title: Kelce hugs Swift: 'You're the best, baby'; Super Bowl 2024 win — engagement goes viral
content: Pop icon Taylor Swift and NFL star Travis Kelce are engaged! The couple, whose romance blossomed after a viral Super Bowl moment in 2024, announced their engagement on Instagram. Kelce proposed on August 26, 2025, with a vintage diamond ring.

title: Bill Gates answers to interview question: What are salary expectations
content: Bill Gates shared his perspective on handling the salary expectation question during job interviews, advocating for a focus on long-term vision and stock options over immediate cash. In a 2020 mock interview, he emphasized the importance of transparency and trust, signaling confidence in the company's potential.

title: PM Modi avoided 4 Donald Trump calls in recent weeks: Report
content: Amid escalating trade tensions, Prime Minister Narendra Modi reportedly declined multiple calls from US President Donald Trump, signaling a strain in relations. This comes as Trump claimed to have averted a nuclear war between India and Pakistan, a claim widely disputed.

title: ‘Vipin’s mother used Instagram too, reels not reason for Nikki's murder’: Investigators
content: The suspected dowry murder of Nikki Bhati is under intense investigation, with new CCTV footage and a hospital memo suggesting a gas cylinder blast adding complexity. Nikki's family alleges she was tortured for dowry, while her sister claims she was deliberately set on fire by her husband and in-laws.

title: Upset over wife’s refusal to cook egg curry, man takes own life in Chhattisgarh
content: In a tragic incident in Chhattisgarh's Dhamtari district, a 40-year-old man, Tikuram Sen, allegedly committed suicide after a dispute with his wife. The disagreement arose when she refused to cook egg curry, citing the 'Karu Bhaat' festival and her upcoming fast.

title: Google abandons virtual hiring model: CEO says AI cheating unstoppable
content: Google is reintroducing in-person job interviews as CEO Sundar Pichai addresses concerns about AI-driven cheating during virtual hiring. This decision marks a shift from the remote practices adopted during the pandemic. Employees raised the issue, prompting Google to balance efficiency with the need to ensure the authenticity of the hiring process, acknowledging that competitors face similar challenges.

title: Apple announces ‘Awe Dropping’ event for September 9
content: Apple's 'Awe dropping' event on September 9 is set to unveil the iPhone 17 lineup, including a new ultra-thin 'Air' model. Camera upgrades are expected across the range, with Pro models boasting enhanced telephoto capabilities. The Apple Watch Series 11 and Ultra 3 are also anticipated, alongside the AirPods Pro 3 with potential health-tracking features.

title: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce: Engagement confirmed; sweet Instagram post melts hearts
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are engaged! Swift announced the news on Instagram on August 26, 2025, sharing photos of Kelce's proposal. Her playful caption, “Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting married,” delighted fans. The couple's romance began in the summer of 2023 after Kelce's public attempt to give Swift a friendship bracelet.

title: 201 international wickets, one favourite: Sachin Tendulkar's pick will surprise you
content: Sachin Tendulkar, celebrated for his batting, also possessed valuable bowling skills. Despite limited opportunities, he claimed 46 Test wickets, with a cherished moment arriving in the 2004 Multan Test. Asked about his favorite wicket, Tendulkar recalled dismissing Moin Khan with a deceptive googly on the day's final ball.

title: Wayne Gretzky: Dad urged one more year; my last NHL game was awful
content: Wayne Gretzky's last game was a grand event. But a quiet car ride with his father, Walter, meant more. Walter drove Wayne to Madison Square Garden. He kept urging Wayne to play another year. Walter's influence shaped Wayne's career. Family always came first. Walter's lessons continue to guide Wayne. He was more than a hockey legend.

title: Report: Some NFL partners wary of Taylor Swift joining WAG circles
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's relationship is evolving, with insiders suggesting they are seriously considering their future. While navigating love in the spotlight presents unique challenges, Jets' wives acknowledge Swift's exceptional situation. Sources indicate that Swift and Kelce are aligned on their ambitions and long-term goals, solidifying their bond and commitment to each other.

title: NFL:Tomlin backs another QB as Steelers sideline Aaron Rodgers
content: Aaron Rodgers' arrival in Pittsburgh is big news. But the Steelers' success depends on the whole team. Veterans and young players are key. Skylar Thompson's preseason performance shows the team's depth. Coach Mike Tomlin trusts proven players. The Steelers' season depends on coaching, health, and the team. Their gritty, team-first style will decide their playoff chances.

title: Bills on 'tainted' netas: Kapil Sibal counters Amit Shah's 'morality pitch'
content: The proposed Constitution (130th Amendment) Bill, 2025, intended to automatically remove arrested leaders, faces opposition accusations of being a tool to destabilize non-BJP governments. Kapil Sibal criticized the government's "constitutional morality" pitch citing instances of alleged misuse of investigative agencies like the ED against opposition leaders.

title: Taylor Swift’s net worth: Inside her music empire — Financial status of Kelce’s fiancée revealed
content: Taylor Swift has officially reached billionaire status as of August 2025, with a net worth of $1.6 billion, according to Forbes. Her fortune is primarily built through her music, record-breaking Eras Tour, and strategic acquisition of her master recordings. Beyond her financial success, Swift is known for her philanthropic efforts, donating to various causes and generously rewarding her tour staff.

title: US eyes defence pie! Will Trump admin buy stakes in Lockheed Martin, Boeing?
content: The Trump administration is considering acquiring ownership stakes in defence industry giants like Lockheed Martin and Boeing, signaling a significant increase in government involvement in American industry. This move follows similar interventions, including investments in Intel, reflecting a strategy to bolster domestic enterprises.

title: 'India should not be inspired by US': IAF chief warns against rushing theatre commands
content: Air Chief Marshal A. P. Singh cautioned against hastily implementing theatre commands, advocating for an India-specific model. He proposed establishing a joint planning and coordination center in Delhi under the Chiefs of Staff Committee to prepare for future conflicts. Singh emphasized learning from Operation Sindoor's success, highlighting inter-service coordination.

title: US tariffs: How govt aims to counter impact - from GST cuts to next-gen reforms
content: India is preparing for 50% US tariffs starting August 27, prompting policy reforms and a push for 'Made in India' products. The government is restructuring GST, exploring export aid, and finalizing FTAs to counter the impact. Despite potential export challenges, economists remain confident in India's economic growth, supported by strong domestic consumption and stable fundamentals.

title: J&K flash floods: 7 killed as landslide hits Vaishno Devi shrine route; yatra suspended
content: Heavy monsoon rains triggered a landslide on the Mata Vaishno Devi shrine route in Jammu and Kashmir, injuring at least six. The yatra has been suspended, and trains to Katra cancelled. Widespread disruption continues across the region with landslides blocking the Jammu-Srinagar highway and cloudbursts causing flash floods in Doda.

title: Swifties are already hunting down engagement dress online: All you need to know
content: Taylor Swift's engagement announcement featured her in a $398 Ralph Lauren Striped Silk-Blend Dress, sparking immediate fan obsession. The dress, with its black-and-white stripes, smocked bodice, and A-line skirt, quickly sold out after being marked down. Its affordable luxe appeal, retro charm, and easy styling made it a hit, embodying Swift's timeless and whimsical style.

title: Happy Ganesh Chaturthi 2025: Wishes, messages, quotes, images and more
content: Ganesh Chaturthi, a ten-day festival honoring Lord Ganesha, is set to commence on August 27th. Celebrated with fervor in Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, the festival features the installation of Ganesha idols, prayers, and community events. The celebration culminates in the Visarjan, the immersion of idols.

title: New BJP president: Is Shivraj Singh Chouhan leading the race? Agriculture minister responds
content: Union Agriculture Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan is prioritizing agricultural production and farmer income. He dismissed speculations about becoming the next BJP president. Chouhan emphasized his dedication to his ministerial duties. He aims to boost rural development and empower women through self-help groups. He sees serving farmers as a form of worship. Chouhan's focus remains on his current responsibilities in the Modi government. JP Nadda's term as BJP president was previously extended.

title: Rampage Jackson reveals death threats: Son’s clash with Syko Stu turns ugly
content: Quinton "Rampage" Jackson is facing a wave of death threats and racist abuse after his son, Raja Jackson, was involved in an altercation at a wrestling event in Los Angeles. The incident occurred when Raja confronted wrestler Syko Stu, who had struck him with a beer can, leading to a physical attack and Stu's hospitalization.

title: 'Living in harmony is our culture': Bhagwat as RSS marks 100 years
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat asserted that Indians share a common DNA for over 40,000 years, emphasising harmony as India's cultural essence. Speaking at an event in New Delhi, he highlighted unity in diversity and the importance of devotion to Bharat Mata.

title: Cheteshwar Pujara retires: Virat Kohli pens emotional note
content: Virat Kohli paid tribute to Cheteshwar Pujara, acknowledging his significant contributions to the Indian batting order, especially at the No.3 position. Kohli highlighted Pujara's role in easing his own batting at No.4 and their memorable partnerships. The former Indian skipper congratulated him on his career and wished him well for the future.

title: 'If need arises ... ': Navy chief on 'opening' against Pak if Op Sindoor resumes
content: Admiral Dinesh Kumar Tripathi affirmed the Indian Navy's readiness to act decisively, continuing Operation Sindoor if necessary. Speaking at the commissioning of INS Udaygiri and INS Himgiri, he highlighted their role in deterring enemies and keeping Pakistan in check. Rajnath Singh commissioned the frigates, emphasizing their advanced capabilities for various missions and contribution to India's maritime security.

title: 'She said yes': Taylor Swift and NFL star Travis Kelce are engaged, share first photos of proposal
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have announced their engagement, marking a fairytale culmination of their two-year romance that has captivated fans worldwide. The couple shared the news via a joint Instagram post, playfully captioning it, "Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting married.

title: Sachin Tendulkar reveals why running with Virender Sehwag was a nightmare
content: During a recent Q&A session on Reddit, Sachin Tendulkar revealed that running between the wickets with Virender Sehwag was a unique challenge. Tendulkar humorously explained that Sehwag preferred hitting boundaries, making singles and doubles a rarity. Despite this, the pair formed a formidable opening partnership in ODIs, amassing 4,387 runs together.

title: Judges vs judges over VP nominee Reddy: 56 retired judges caution peers - what they wrote in letter
content: Following Amit Shah's criticism of Justice Sudershan Reddy's Salwa Judum judgment, 56 retired judges, including former CJIs Sathasivam and Gogoi, issued a counter-statement disagreeing with the initial group of judges who defended Reddy. They urged their colleagues to avoid politically motivated statements, emphasizing that the judiciary should remain distinct from political entanglements.

title: How ‘intent to return’ test is crushing Indian students' American dreams
content: Indian students face mounting hurdles in securing US F-1 visas, with just 9,906 issued between March and May 2025—a 27% drop from last year. Section 214(b) denials, rooted in proving “intent to return,” leave many dreams shattered. Beyond finances or academics, consular officers scrutinize career plans, family ties, travel history, and narratives, turning visa approval into a high-stakes test of persuasion and perception.

title: Weapons, food and living quarters: IDF dismantles 'Hamas underground tunnels' – watch
content: The IDF revealed the dismantling of Hamas's offensive tunnel routes, complete with living facilities and weapons, which were then sealed with concrete. Dozens of terrorists were reportedly eliminated during the operation, with terror infrastructure destroyed both above and below ground.

title: Asia Cup: Sunil Gavaskar hits out - ‘Focus on your country, let us worryaboutours’
content: Sunil Gavaskar has strongly criticized overseas cricketers for commenting on India's team selection, particularly Shreyas Iyer's exclusion from the Asia Cup squad. The legend questioned the need for foreign voices to judge decisions made by Indian selectors, emphasizing that Indian cricket is strictly an Indian affair. He also argued that such foreign players hardly comment when it pertains to matters of their own country.

title: Srinagar airport brawl: Army official put on SpiceJet no fly list for 5 years
content: A senior Army official has been placed on SpiceJet's no-fly list for five years after allegedly assaulting four airline employees at Srinagar airport in July 2025. The incident occurred when staff requested payment for excess baggage. SpiceJet reports that its employees sustained severe injuries, including a spinal fracture and jaw injuries, due to the assault.

title: Indian Navy milestone: Rajnath commissions stealth frigates INS Udaygiri and Himgiri
content: In a historic first, India's Navy commissioned two stealth frigates, INS Udaygiri and INS Himgiri, built at separate shipyards, enhancing maritime capabilities. These Project 17A class warships, featuring advanced technology and significant indigenous content, signify a major boost to India's self-reliance in defence and commitment to maritime security in the Indian Ocean Region. The frigates will join the Eastern Fleet.

title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are engage: Couple jointly announces news in series of pictures
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have announced their engagement. The couple, who have been dating for two years, shared the news in a joint Instagram post on Tuesday. The post featured photos from a garden engagement and was captioned, "Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting married."

title: DMK minister’s son refuses medal from BJP leader Annamalai- See video
content: During a state-level shooting competition in Pudukottai, T R B Raaja's son, Suryaa Rajaa Baalu, declined to receive a medal directly from former BJP state president K Annamalai, opting to take it with his hands.

title: Giants cut Tommy DeVito: Fan-favorite released on NFL cutdown day
content: In a surprising move on NFL cutdown day 2025, the New York Giants released fan-favorite QB Tommy DeVito, despite an undefeated preseason. The Giants opted to keep three quarterbacks: Russell Wilson as the starter, Jameis Winston as the veteran backup, and rookie Jaxson Dart. DeVito's release highlights the tough decisions teams face, even with popular players.

title: 13-yr dies after eating raw instant noodles: Hidden dangers you need to know
content: A 13-year-old boy in Cairo tragically died after consuming three packets of uncooked instant noodles, leading to acute intestinal problems. The incident has sparked debate about processed foods and viral food trends like the 'Eat Ramen Raw' challenge.

title: Watch: Kiren Rijiju halts convoy to help accident victims in Ladakh
content: Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju halted his convoy on the Srinagar-Leh highway upon witnessing a vehicle plunge into the Drass river in Ladakh. Rijiju shared a video showing him speaking to the injured victims.

title: Kenny Pickett traded by Browns: 'Passed around like candy'; Raiders quarterback battle
content: Cleveland Browns traded quarterback Kenny Pickett to Las Vegas Raiders. The Raiders needed a backup after Aidan O'Connell's injury. Fans reacted positively to Pickett's move. They believe he will benefit from working with coach Pete Carroll. The Raiders are strengthening their quarterback depth behind Geno Smith. This move provides insurance for the upcoming season.

title: India, U.S. move to enhance defence partnership
content: The two sides reaffirmed their commitment to promoting a safer, stronger, and more prosperous Indo-Pacific region through the QUAD

title: IDSFFK 2025: ‘Rewritten’, an honest retelling of generational damsels and their self-salvation
content: Rewritten by Yara Naisam looks at a young woman’s understanding of her mother that reveals parts of her own psyche

title: IDSFFK 2025: Greeshma Kuthar and Manju Priya K, creators of ‘Namathu Chinnam?’, on cultural capital in Tamil Nadu during the 2024 Lok Sabha elections
content: The 51-minute documentary, shot across Tamil Nadu, explores the intentional emphasis given to certain art-forms practised by dominant communities, tokenisation of women and establishment of local icons in the state

title: Railways’ Bengaluru Airport link plan set aside as metro, suburban lines take shape
content: In February, Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw had announced the plan as part of a wider push to decongest Bengaluru

title: Centre issues new guidelines for transfusion of animal blood
content: Establishment of State-regulated veterinary blood banks with biosafety standards and mandatory blood typing and cross-matching to prevent incompatibility are the key highlights of the guidelines

title: Supreme Court asks why judiciary can’t review inaction of Governors on bills
content: “If the discretion exercised by a Governor under Article 356 of the Constitution can be judicially reviewed, why not the discretion under Article 200?” Chief Justice Gavai responds to a submission made by the State of Maharashtra about the “wide” discretionary powers of Governors

title: Environment Ministry finalises National Designated Authority to kickstart carbon markets
content: Within the Paris Agreement, a section called Article 6 defines the contours under which such an emissions trading regime, or a market, can take shape; Article 6 was passed at COP29 in Baku last year

title: VIT observes World Entrepreneurs’ Day
content: The event also featured a MoU exchange between Audix Technologies and Tenet Technotronics (Bangalore) paving the way for collaborative innovation and industry–academia partnership.

title: Landslip: traffic banned on Wayanad Ghat Road
content: Soil, boulders, and trees have blocked the road near the 9th hairpin bend, making commute impossible

title: Delhi police seek proof from CPI(M) MP months after he sought probe into cyberbullying of Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri
content: John Brittas says that to insist that corroborating evidence must be furnished by the complainants themselves is contrary to the very spirit of Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2023

title: Chandrababu Naidu government negotiates land swap deal for Oberoi hotels near foothills of Tirumala temple
content: The investment proposal which had been cleared by the previous YSRCP government in Andhra Pradesh had got caught in religious sentiments

title: NCLAT judicial member alleges being approached by judge for favour, recuses himself
content: The bench was hearing an appeal filed by A S Reddy, suspended director of Hyderabad-based KLSR Infratech, which is facing Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP) under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code

title: Bill to remove Ministers facing serious criminal charges will test government’s strength in Parliament
content: More than a week after the bill was referred to a Joint Committee of Parliament, the panel has not yet been constituted

title: What happened to govt. on promise of allowing private sector investment in nuclear power sector, asks Congress
content: The Opposition party asked if the government plans to bring the Bills in the winter session of Parliament and whether it will also bring a Bill to establish an independent regulatory body that is not part of the atomic energy establishment

title: Justice B.V. Nagarathna dissents against Supreme Court Collegium’s decision to elevate Justice Pancholi to top court
content: The five-member Collegium has recommended to the Centre, the names of Bombay High Court Chief Justice Alok Aradhe and Justice Pancholi for elevation as top court judges

title: Real money gaming firms unlikely to contest ban
content: The RMG industry quickly complied with the Act by discontinuing money games altogether, even though the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology is yet to notify the law

title: Forest officer wins silver at World Transplant Games
content: Cyclist Mr. Naidu shifted to racewalking after surviving liver disease in 2020 as advised by his doctors.

title: ED questions Mangaluru cooker blast case accused
content: Different cryptocurrency dealers deposited a total of ₹2.8 lakh in mule accounts, and ₹41,680 was collected in cash from PoS agents, which was used to purchase items online to assemble the IED, hire hideouts and conduct recces, finds probe

title: Digital Kerala project launched for efficient governance, service delivery
content: Citizens will have the opportunity to provide feedback on the portals immediately after receiving each service. AI will be used as a tool to provide guidance, analysis, and timely suggestions

title: Andhra Pradesh government approves Smart Street Vending Markets in seven cities
content: The initiative under DAY-NULM will provide organised, eco-friendly vending hubs, digital payments, Wi-Fi, and skill training, providing tech-enabled spaces for 580 vendors, with priority for women, differently-abled, and marginalised communities

title: IDSFFK 2025: documentary Sathyapullu explores how political conflicts play out in individual mind
content: The docu, being screened in the Focus: Long Documentary section at the 17th International Documentary and Short Film Festival of Kerala,  travels simultaneously through India’s present political conflicts as well as the ways in which they push a young Muslim woman into the depths of depression

title: Theft at Poojappura prison-run cafeteria: one held
content: The accused, Mohammad Abdul Hadi of Pothencode, had previously served jail sentences for thefts and is suspected to have worked in the cafeteria during his imprisonment

title: ‘Bangladeshi’ poll plank will fail in Assam just as it did in Jharkhand: Gaurav Gogoi
content: The State Congress president says people want to see Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma behind bars for ‘injustice and misuse of power’. The Assam government’s eviction drives have affected Bengalis, tribals, Scheduled Castes, and Other Backward Castes, apart from Muslims, he says

title: Aryanad grama panchayat member found dead; suicide suspected
content: Her family, who claimed that she was facing financial issues, alleged that a CPI(M)-led campaign targeting Sreeja over such matters pushed her to take the extreme step

title: Disciplinary action on TDP spokesperson fizzles out with an apology
content: Party disciplinary committee summoned Sudhakar Reddy to Amaravati demanding an explanation over the serious charges of corruption and misconduct levelled by him on a number of MLAs, besides a personal remark against a Cabinet Minister

title: Inside the Adi Karmayogi initiative, training sessions involve ‘candle-lighting’, role-playing, ‘knot-tying’ activities
content: Officials say the idea is to create a ‘cadre’ of 20 lakh ‘change leaders’ for tribal villages through a ‘participatory’ approach

title: 56 jurists counter statement by 18 ex-judges criticising Home Minister Amit Shah’s remarks on Salwa Judum judgment
content: The signatories include former Chief Justices of India Ranjan Gogoi, a nominated Rajya Sabha member, and P. Sathasivam; and retired Supreme Court judges A.K. Sikri and M.R. Shah

title: Kerala High Court suspends Family Court judge following allegations of sexual misbehaviour
content: The decision to suspend former Family Court Judge V. Udayakumars taken after a meeting of the Administrative Committee of the court.  The alleged incidents reportedly took place inside the chamber of the judge in the court complex in Chavara

title: In-principle approval for ₹1,500-crore loan from HUDCO for completion of LIFE houses
content: 1,27,601 houses, including 95,922 which could not be completed the previous year as well as 31,679 planned for 2025-26, are at various stages of construction

title: All set for grand Ganesh festival celebrations in Hubballi-Dharwad starting today
content: With just a day to go, markets witnessed huge crowds as thousands rushed to make last-minute purchases for the festival

title: NTR district sets World Record by making 7,730 eco-friendly Ganesh idols
content: The record was held by Maharashtra with 4,464 clay idols; devotees are requested to upload a selfie with eco-friendly Ganeshas on NTR IGNITE APP or send to 91549 70454 to get a certificate from the District Administration

title: Besieged by the anti-Mamkootathil campaign, Congress vows to take its fightback to CPI(M)-BJP doorsteps
content: Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan threatens to open a  Pandora’s box of “incriminating evidence of moral degeneracy” against CPI(M) and BJP “big names”. He says the expose will send the leadership of both the parties scurrying for cover and take the wind out of their respective recriminatory campaigns against the Congress

title: Quinn Hughes, Cale Makar lead defenseman ratings in NHL 26
content: Quinn Hughes of the Vancouver Canucks has been crowned the most stalwart defender with 95 OVR . the american is among the top five highest-rated athletes in the entire game . Zach Werenski , Roman Josi , Victor Hedman , and Rasmus Dahlin are chasing the top 20 .

title: Striker moves prompting more striker moves: How top Premier League clubs net out
content: arsenal have signed a striker this summer . the striker was injured against Leeds on saturday . a bigger club, Manchester United, got involved, and sesko went there instead . click here for all the latest arsenal news .

title: MMA divisional rankings: How big of a boost did victory give Aljamain Sterling?
content: aljamain Sterling had a sizable obstacle to overcome when a featherweight fight was shifted to a 153-pound catchweight . Ortega was unable to weigh in at the original 146-pound limit . he was fought at a full 18 pounds more than the weight he used to have to hit .

title: Why Jayden Daniels and Drake Maye will beat player futures projections
content: the 2025 season is just around the corner, so it's time to look at the odds . our analysts did just that, scouring the odds trying to find numbers that stood out . despite constant pressure, the Washington Commanders QB completed 69% of his passes for 3,568 yards .

title: Madden NFL 26 Team Captains program honors leaders from the 2010s
content: Madden NFL 26 is available to play . players can be upgraded to 83 OVR, becoming strong members of any squad . team Captains' maximum OVR cap will be raised throughout the game's lifecycle . the promo pays tribute to successful team leaders from the 2010s .

title: From Tennessee to UCLA, Nico Iamaleava is getting a fresh start close to home
content: Nico Iamaleava's transfer to UCLA could reinvigorate its football program . the 20-year-old quarterback barely reacts, but his soft-spoken demeanor does not give away much . he speaks of the appeal of UCLA, the chance to be home an american .

title: Is Gladbach the place to boost Reyna's career?
content: the 22-year-old is in desperate need of a fresh start . he is plagued by injuries and inconsistency in the past four seasons . the american earned just 342 minutes in the previous Bundesliga season .

title: Four picks to win your finals
content: injuries are influencing rotations around the league, such as the wave of starters missing for the Indiana Fever . it can be frustrating when the stars that helped get you this far are sidelined, but it also creates openings for hidden gems to step up . don't be afraid to take risks as short-term production matters more than name value .

title: News: Yankees ready to welcome back Volpe
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around baseball . all 15 of today's games will be played under the lights, beginning at 6:35 p.m. ET in Camden Yards . the only game potentially threatened by rain is the Cleveland Guardians hosting the Tampa Bay Rays - the only one potentially threatened .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as a one-stop shop for all of our best material as you prepare to make the best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot at a championship.

title: How the Fever and four other WNBA teams can clinch playoff spots
content: the 2025 WNBA playoff picture is taking shape . the top teams in the league are fighting for playoff seeding and home-court advantage . five teams, all within four games of each other, are realistically vying for the final three spots .

title: How Kalen DeBoer looks to make things right in Year 2 at Alabama
content: "it was basically the elephant in the room," says a team meeting . "if you don't want to be here, leave," says the team's head strength coach . a meeting in which coach David Ballou spared nobody in an earsplitting tirade .

title: Was approached to favour a party: Tribunal judge opts out of insolvency case
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: College Football Playoff 2025: G5 contenders lead preseason bubble watch
content: the first and last top-25 rankings of the season will be the inclusion of a group of 5 conference champion in the top 12 . the Broncos have the highest chance to reach the playoff (25%) of any G5 team . coach Spencer Danielson met with his players and reminded them that they weren't ranked at all .

title: Why Washington's offense is the big winner in Terry McLaurin's new deal
content: new: a former assistant coach says the deal needed to get done . new: the real money on the new deal won't be known until the three-year deal . the deal is expected to be announced on monday . it's unclear who won the contract extension .

title: Rattler to start Saints' opener as QB battle ends
content: the new Orleans saints will start quarterback Spencer Rattler against the Arizona Cardinals on sept. 7 . the saints were the last team to name a starting quarterback for the 2025 season . third-year quarterback Jake Haener also factored into the competition early in the summer .
